A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow didn't realise I was watching a comedy\, yes you can add jokes here and there but every scene? Gets repetitive especially with a matured audience...wait that's right Disney bought rights so they can chop and change where they feel necessary to gain more revenue via marketing\, merchandising etc. I went into to this movie with high expectations for Luke returning (my fault) and they (in my opinion) did NOT deliver. That's why I'm giving it a half star\, a few great scenes with a lot of (different) woman crying. Many unanswered questions left from Force Awakens still unanswered in Last Jedi. Welcome to the new Stars Wars franchise\, thank you Disney!
